title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: printed and painted on 4 & 1 satin with selvedge of 4 & 1 twill (black outline was printed by engraved plate; all other colors were filled  in by brush)
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a; weft selvedge to selvedge): 161.5 x 47.5 cm (5 ft. 3 9/16 in. x 18 11/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b; weft selvedge to selvedge): 29 x 47.5 cm (11 7/16 x 18 11/16 in.)
Repeat H: 141 cm (55 1/2 in.)
description: Outdoor scenes in a changing landscape. Activities include fishing, hunting, harvesting and music-making.
